entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
